result.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership-system-leader-designation-data
result.notes: Designation statuses for individual NCTL members and schools, academies, such as teaching schools, National Leaders of Education, Local Leaders of Education, Specialist Leaders of education and National Leaders of Governance. data are also held in relation to unsuccessful applications for designation, specific specialisms, former designation statuses and reasons for de designations

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership System Leader Designation Data

extras.value: Details of currently designated individuals and schools are published and updated regularly on the Department for Education website apart from Specialist Leaders where this is not required for business processes and permission is not sought. Data relating to de designations is not published due to sensitive personal nature of data.
